citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 PM on 9/17/2025.
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling contact phone number (was unable to leave a voice
mail), texting contact phone number, and waited in driveway for approx. one (1) hour. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 PM on 9/17/2025. 
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling contact phone number (was unable to leave a voice 
mail), texting contact phone number, and waited in driveway for approx. one (1) hour. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
